configuration

Class ModuleConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • configuration.ModuleConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChecksumFileModuleConfig, DirectoryMonitorModuleConfig, GeneralExecutableModuleConfig, GeneralExecutableModuleConfig, LogGrepConfig, ProcessExtractionModulesConfiguration, RegexConfig, XmlQueryConfig

    public class ModuleConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for an AbstractModule. The modules are distinguished by a hash value of their configurations. The configuration is serialized to JSON, when the tool is closed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean enabled
      flags, if the module is currently used for extraction
      java.lang.String eventAddToProfile

      includes or excludes file types

      Changeable module name, only used for displaying purposes

      Not-changeable module name

      Current version of the module
      boolean recordEvents
      records events at event file

      • addSupportedSystem

        public ModuleConfiguration addSupportedSystem(OperatingSystem.OsName os)

        Returns:
